posts.post_content:
OK, as I prepare myself for a couple of large purchases, some of the items in my HOF box need to go.  (OK, "large" for me anyway!) :)  

I haven't had these all that long, but I need to part with them.

T206 Sweet Caporal Rube Marquard hands at thighs RC - raw Fair = $50
T206 Piedmont Roger Bresnahan w/ Bat SGC 10 = $SOLD!
T206 Piedmont Jack Chesbro portrait SGC 10 = $SOLD!
T206 Piedmont Willie Keeler portrait SGC 10 = $SOLD!

Jimi
All cards have been reduced!  Gotta sell, folks!  :)
